text: In the thirtieth year, on the fifth day of the fourth month, while I was among the exiles at the Kebar River, the heavens opened and I saw a divine vision.

(On the <st data-num="02568" class="">fifth</st> day of the <st data-num="02320" class="">month</st>—<st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> was the <st data-num="02549" class="">fifth</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st> of <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="03112" class="">Jehoiachin’s</st> <st data-num="01546" class="">exile</st>—
the Lord’s message came to the priest Ezekiel the son of Buzi, at the Kebar River in the land of the Babylonians. The hand of the Lord came on him there.)
As I watched, I noticed a windstorm coming from the north—an enormous cloud, with lightning flashing, such that bright light rimmed it and came from it like glowing amber from the middle of a fire.

<st data-num="08432" class="">In</st> the fire<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="01823" class="">what looked like</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">living beings</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="02088" class="">In</st> their <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st> <st data-num="02007" class="">they</st> had <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="01823" class="">form</st>,<n id="4" />

but <st data-num="0259" class="">each</st> had <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">faces</st> and <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st>.

Their <st data-num="07272" class="">legs</st> were <st data-num="07272 03477">straight</st>, but the <st data-num="03709" class="">soles</st> of their <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> were like <st data-num="05695" class="">calves’</st> <st data-num="03709 07272">feet</st>. They <st data-num="05340" class="">gleamed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05869" class="">like</st> <st data-num="07044" class="">polished</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>.

They had <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07253" class="">sides</st>. As for the <st data-num="06440" class="">faces</st> and <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> of the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> of them,
their wings touched each other; they did not turn as they moved, but went straight ahead.
Their faces had this appearance: Each of the four had the face of a man, with the face of a lion on the right, the face of an ox on the left, and also the face of an eagle.

Their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> were <st data-num="06504" class="">spread out</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">above</st> them; <st data-num="0376" class="">each</st> had <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> wings <st data-num="02266" class="">touching</st> the wings of <st data-num="0376" class="">one of the other beings</st> on either side and <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> wings <st data-num="03680" class="">covering</st> their <st data-num="01472" class="">bodies</st>.

<st data-num="0376" class="">Each</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st> <st data-num="0413 05676">straight</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">ahead</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="0413 0834 08033">wherever</st> the <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st><n id="2" /> would <st data-num="01961 01980">go</st>, they would <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">turning</st> as they <st data-num="01980" class="">went</st>.

In the <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="02416" class="">living beings</st> was <st data-num="04758" class="">something like</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01197" class="">burning</st> <st data-num="01513" class="">coals</st> of <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st><n id="3" /> or <st data-num="04758" class="">like</st> <st data-num="03940" class="">torches</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">moved back and forth</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">living beings</st>. <st data-num="0784" class="">It</st> was <st data-num="05051" class="">bright</st>, and <st data-num="01300" class="">lightning</st> was <st data-num="03318" class="">flashing out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.
The living beings moved backward and forward as quickly as flashes of lightning.
Then I looked, and I saw one wheel on the ground beside each of the four beings.

The <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st> of the <st data-num="0212" class="">wheels</st> and their <st data-num="04639" class="">construction</st><n id="1" /> was like <st data-num="05869" class="">gleaming</st> <st data-num="08658" class="">jasper</st>,<n id="2" /> and all <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> wheels <st data-num="01823" class="">looked</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">alike</st>. Their <st data-num="04758 04639">structure</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="0212" class="">wheel</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">within</st> a <st data-num="0212" class="">wheel</st>.<n id="3" />

When they <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st> they would <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> any of the <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07253" class="">directions</st> they faced <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> <st data-num="05437" class="">turning</st> as they <st data-num="01980" class="">moved</st>.
Their rims were high and awesome, and the rims of all four wheels were full of eyes all around.
When the living beings moved, the wheels beside them moved; when the living beings rose up from the ground, the wheels rose up too.

<st data-num="05921 0834 08033">Wherever</st> the <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">would</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st>, they would <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="0212" class="">wheels</st> would <st data-num="05375" class="">rise up</st> <st data-num="05980" class="">beside</st> them <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st><n id="3" /> of the <st data-num="02416" class="">living being</st> was in the <st data-num="0212" class="">wheel</st>.

When the living beings moved, the wheels moved, and when they stopped moving, the wheels stopped. When they rose up from the ground, the wheels rose up from the ground; the wheels rose up beside them because the spirit of the living being was in the wheel.
Over the heads of the living beings was something like a platform, glittering awesomely like ice, stretched out over their heads.

<st data-num="08478" class="">Under</st> the <st data-num="07549" class="">platform</st> their <st data-num="03671" class="">wings</st> were <st data-num="03477" class="">stretched out</st>, <st data-num="0802" class="">each</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st> the <st data-num="0269" class="">other</st>. <st data-num="0376" class="">Each</st> of the <st data-num="02007" class="">beings</st> also had <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> wings <st data-num="03680" class="">covering</st><n id="1" /> its <st data-num="01472" class="">body</st>.

When they moved, I heard the sound of their wings—it was like the sound of rushing waters, or the voice of the Sovereign One, or the tumult of an army. When they stood still, they lowered their wings.
Then there was a voice from above the platform over their heads when they stood still.

<st data-num="04605" class="">Above</st> the <st data-num="07549 0834">platform</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">over</st> their <st data-num="07218" class="">heads</st> was <st data-num="04758" class="">something like</st> a <st data-num="068 05601">sapphire</st> <st data-num="01823" class="">shaped like</st> a <st data-num="03678" class="">throne</st>. <st data-num="05921 04605">High above</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01823 03678">throne</st> was a <st data-num="01823" class="">form</st> that <st data-num="04758" class="">appeared</st> to be a <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>.

I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> an <st data-num="02830" class="">amber</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">glow</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04758" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">enclosed</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04758" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="04975" class="">waist</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">up</st>. <st data-num="04758" class="">From</st> his <st data-num="04975" class="">waist</st> <st data-num="04295" class="">down</st> I <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="04758" class="">something that looked like</st> <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>. There was a <st data-num="05051" class="">brilliant light</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> it,

like the appearance of a rainbow in the clouds after the rain. This was the appearance of the surrounding brilliant light; it looked like the glory of the Lord. When I saw it, I threw myself face down, and I heard a voice speaking.
